text: Brenda Chapman (born November 1, 1962) is an American director, storyboard artist and writer. == Early life == Chapman was born in Beason, Illinois as the youngest of five. == Personal life == Chapman was married to director Kevin Lima and had a daughter Emma Rose Lima. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1962 births Category:American animators Category:Annie Award winners Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Illinois Category:Screenwriters from Illinois
title: Brenda Chapman
